title: to fix errors in "make devtools" and "make bindigs"
body:
```
 make devtools
core/types/codecgen-pkg-2.generated.go:62:12: undefined: codec.Gen
# please don't upgrade `github.com/ugorji/go` version
```

```
 make bindigs
panic: invalid argument, not cli.Flag type: cli.StringFlag
```

```
FAIL: TestGolangBindings (1.34s)
    bind_test.go:1866: failed to run binding test: exit status 2
        ./crowdsale.go:512:17: undefined: libcommon
```

After pulling the latest devel, doing `make all` then `make devtools` and `make bindings`, I'm not having these issues. I'm using mac os ventura 13.2 on ARM

## make devtools
Succeeds:
```bash
~/Documents/eth/erigon % make devtools
# Notice! If you adding new binary - add it also to cmd/hack/binary-deps/main.go file
CGO_CFLAGS="-g -O2  -DMDBX_FORCE_ASSERTIONS=0  -O -D__BLST_PORTABLE__ -Wno-error=strict-prototypes " go  build -trimpath -tags nosqlite,noboltdb -buildvcs=false -ldflags "-X github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/params.GitCommit=cf22a098a76c96fd7cd030922a0615e18b72d0a6 -X github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/params.GitBranch=HEAD -X github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/params.GitTag=v2.31.0-rc.4-464-gcf22a098a" -o /Users/kian/Documents/eth/erigon/build/bin/go-bindata github.com/kevinburke/go-bindata/go-bindata
```

## make bindings
Fails on solidity compliation? 
```bash
~/Documents/eth/erigon % make bindings
PATH=/Users/kian/Documents/eth/erigon/build/bin:/Users/kian/Documents/eth/trueblocks/trueblocks-core/bin:/Users/kian/.yarn/bin:/Users/kian/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/.bin:/usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/2.7.0/bin:/usr/local/opt/ruby/bin:/Users/kian/.nvm/versions/node/v16.11.0/bin:/Users/kian/.nvm/versions/node/v16.11.0/bin:/Users/kian/.nvm/versions/node/v14.1.0/bin:/Users/kian/.pyenv/shims:/Users/kian/.pyenv/bin:/Users/kian/.cargo/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin:/opt/homebrew/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/System/Cryptexes/App/usr/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:/usr/local/go/bin:/Applications/Keybase.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin:/Library/Apple/usr/bin:/Applications/Postgres.app/Contents/Versions/latest/bin:/Users/kian/Documents/eth/trueblocks/trueblocks-core/bin:/Users/kian/.yarn/bin:/Users/kian/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/.bin:/usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/2.7.0/bin:/usr/local/opt/ruby/bin:/Users/kian/.nvm/versions/node/v16.11.0/bin:/Users/kian/.pyenv/bin:/Users/kian/.cargo/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin:/opt/homebrew/sbin:/Users/kian/.local/bin:/Users/kian/bin:/Users/kian/go/bin:/Users/kian/.local/bin:/Users/kian/bin:/bin:/Users/kian/go/bin:/Users/kian/.local/bin go generate ./tests/contracts/
Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
--> testcontract.sol

Warning: Visibility for constructor is ignored. If you want the contract to be non-deployable, making it "abstract" is sufficient.
 --> testcontract.sol:5:5:
  |
5 |     constructor() public {
  |     ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).

Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
--> selfDestructor.sol

Warning: Visibility for constructor is ignored. If you want the contract to be non-deployable, making it "abstract" is sufficient.
 --> selfDestructor.sol:5:5:
  |
5 |     constructor() public {
  |     ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).

Error: Type address is not implicitly convertible to expected type address payable.
  --> selfDestructor.sol:10:9:
   |
10 |         address payable nil = address(0);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Warning: "selfdestruct" has been deprecated. The underlying opcode will eventually undergo breaking changes, and its use is not recommended.
  --> selfDestructor.sol:11:9:
   |
11 |         selfdestruct(nil);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^

tests/contracts/gen.go:8: running "solc": exit status 1
make: *** [bindings] Error 1
```
`make devtools` results in the following diff on my machine. should this be committed? https://gist.github.com/fafrd/f026ff9d4281f4f8553287b4f58debce

Ah- actually this line in the Makefile generates code that does not compile:
```make
PATH=$(GOBIN):$(PATH) go generate ./consensus/aura/...
```
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
